title: Nerd Knight: Infiltration
description: It's time for a new kind of hero. Kelli suspects that she's more than just an ordinary art student, but it's confirmed when her life is surrounded by people who obviously want something from her. Fortunately it all comes together for her when she's visited by a strange outsider who turned out actually be a nerd knight.Nerd Knight is a humorous science fiction espionage adventure; imagine a combination of Mission Impossible, Dr. Who, Mork and Mindy and you may have a touch of what to expect.
author: Mark Mekkes
